description: Dashboard now includes an onboarding checklist that tracks your progress (e.g. completing your first submission, adding a profile photo) with the ability to dismiss the section.
Theme toggle (light/dark) has been moved from the header to profile settings. The user menu and mobile nav now include quick links to View Profile and Edit Profile.

Email notifications now follow best practices for compliance and reliability: physical address in footers (CAN-SPAM), List-Unsubscribe headers for easier opt-out, and improved delivery with idempotency and retries.
